ygData.subject: Re: Skill Changes
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Mik!  As I told a friend last week, it s much the same as playing cards, chess or some other game with friends... I get to chat it up with them,
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Mik! As I told a friend last week, it's much the same as playing
cards, chess or some other game with friends... I get to chat it up with
them, sometimes talk over old times, and even MAKE NEW friends...

But hey, watching TV can do the same, right? (NOT!)

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: Mikaela <mikaela@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 8:36 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Skill Changes


> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
> I agree with you Lemac.....a lot of my friends think I'm nuts because I
> spend my evenings in EQ when I get home from work until I go to bed. But
> when I ask them what THEY did, they spent 4 - 5 hours watching TV. Oh
yeah,
> that's REAL stimulating...::rolls her eyes::
>
> I view my time in EQ as entertainment that I enjoy. If some people like
to
> spend their free time doing something else, that's their perogative.
> Different strokes for different folks......just don't criticize me for
doing
> something with my time that I thoroughly enjoy. When it stops being fun,
> I'll spend those hours doing something else I enjoy. Til then...see you
all
> in Norrath.....
>
> Mikaela R'achai of The Rathe
>
>
